  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/dentro-da-nevoa-criando-sombra-e-fortuna" title="Dentro da Névoa: criando Sombra e Fortuna" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-23603" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/dentro-da-nevoa-criando-sombra-e-fortuna">Dentro da Névoa: criando Sombra e Fortuna</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Sombra e Fortuna é a história de Miss Fortune, do Tormento e dos eventos posteriores aos de Águas de Sentina: Marés Ardentes. É também a história de para onde a bússola da narrativa de League está apontado.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-43599">1 year ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/blog-do-desenvolvedor-biografias-melhores" title="Blog do Desenvolvedor: biografias melhores" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-23385" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/blog-do-desenvolvedor-biografias-melhores">Blog do Desenvolvedor: biografias melhores</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Durante o evento Águas de Sentina: Marés Ardentes, você pode ter notado que aproveitamos a oportunidade para atualizar as biografias de Campeões chave mostrados na história: Twisted Fate, Graves, Miss Fortune e Gangplank. 
Com os comentários apurados e o formato definido, agora vamos tentar começar a trabalhar em novas biografias para todos os Campeões existentes. Espie aqui como vamos enfrentar este enorme desafio.
</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-43265">1 year ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-preface-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-preface-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-preface" class="zone zone-preface clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-4 region region-preface-first" id="region-preface-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-preface-first-inner">
    <div class="block block-panels-mini block-career-header block-panels-mini-career-header odd block-without-title" id="block-panels-mini-career-header">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" id="mini-panel-career_header">
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-node careers-landing-header" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="ds-1col exp-layout-text-related node node-explore-banner view-mode-full clearfix ">
    <div class="field-group-format group_scroll_group field-group-div group-scroll-group scroll-pane-explore speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field-group-format group_explore_meta field-group-div group-explore-meta  speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Rioters Wanted</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&rsquo;re looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. These individuals will become part of entrepreneurial teams who prefer action (kicking ass) over process and bureaucracy (taking names). We embrace those who see things differently, who <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">aren&#39;t afraid to experiment</a>, and who have a healthy disregard for the rules.</p>
<p>Applicants should first learn about Riot and play <em>League of Legends </em>because we&#39;re looking for people who, like us, take play seriously and for whom it&#39;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own, because hands-on gaming experience is our ultimate guiding compass.</p>
<p>We&#39;re hiring for multiple levels, from associate to lead, so don&#39;t get hung up on the title; it&#39;s all about the team. For the roles below that are listed by team name, we&#39;re hiring for varying levels of XP.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-explore-related-articles field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Riot Games Tokyo</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20150519/1248/riot-games-tokyo" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sdowney odd clearfix" id="node-article-1248">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Riot Games Tokyo" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 04-28-14</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20150519/1248/riot-games-tokyo">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20150519/1248/riot-games-tokyo">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-e52998c6-9bac-9756-bd8e-46cccb9c26de">Meet Tokyo: Japan&rsquo;s capital and the most populated metropolitan area in the world. Home of&nbsp;<a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akihabara" target="_blank">Akihabara&nbsp;</a>-- a sprawling mecca of manga, anime, electronics, and video games -- the gravity-defying skyscrapers of Shinjuku, and Tokyo Game Show. A city dotted with shrines, scenic views, and -- oh yeah -- the most 3-star Michelin restaurants in the world. It&rsquo;s no surprise we ended up here.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-e52998c6-9bac-9756-bd8e-46cccb9c26de">It&rsquo;s the electric heart of Japan and now home to a growing crew of Rioters. As we build teams across Esports, Player Support, Marketing, Localization, Community, and more, we&rsquo;re pushing the throttle into overdrive to create local in- and around-game experiences that delight players throughout Japan.</span></p>
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e52998c6-9bac-9756-bd8e-46cccb9c26de">We&rsquo;re still assembling a crack team of Rioters in Tokyo, but we&rsquo;re getting close to hitting that big green &ldquo;GO&rdquo; button. So hang around; we&rsquo;re just getting started.</span></p>
<p class="rtecenter"><a class="intern-btn" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers/?offices=1429&amp;depts=" target="_blank">Check out Open Jobs</a></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span>  </div>

      </div>
</article>
    </div>

    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Watch (and Rewatch) Our GDC Talks</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20140418/1240/watch-and-rewatch-our-gdc-talks" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sdowney odd clearfix" id="node-article-1240">
        <span property="dc:title" content=" Watch (and Rewatch) Our GDC Talks" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 04-18-14</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20140418/1240/watch-and-rewatch-our-gdc-talks">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20140418/1240/watch-and-rewatch-our-gdc-talks">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/GDCheader.png?itok=eWXwr8p4" width="700" height="301" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-efa73bf4-7742-ad82-6e44-b129759e4798">With GDC 2014 in the rearview, we&rsquo;re already excited to take a look back and share a few talks from the conference.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-efa73bf4-7742-ad82-6e44-b129759e4798">If you&rsquo;re interested in learning more about the lessons we&rsquo;ve learned while developing features that support and promote positive player experiences in </span>League matches, head over to the GDC Vault and check out Jeffrey Lin&rsquo;s &ldquo;<a href="http://www.gdcvault.com/play/1020389/Enhancing-Sportsmanship-in-Online" target="_blank">Enhancing Sportsmanship in Online Games</a>&rdquo; presentation.</p>
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-efa73bf4-7742-ad82-6e44-b129759e4798">Strapped for time? Can&rsquo;t watch a video right now? Jeffrey also chatted with Red Bull Esports&rsquo; Philippa Warr about the OP nature of teamwork. You can give it a read using </span><a href="http://www.redbull.com/en/esports/stories/1331644583441/teamwork-op-riot-on-making-good-the-easy-choice" target="_blank">this very fancy link</a>.</p>
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-efa73bf4-7742-ad82-6e44-b129759e4798">And if you had a main conference pass at the show this year, you can use your login info to access Andrew McVeigh&rsquo;s &ldquo;</span><a href="http://www.gdcvault.com/play/1020404/Evolving-the-Server-Side-Architecture" target="_blank">Evolving the Server-Side Architecture of League of Legends</a>&rdquo; and Christina Norman&rsquo;s &ldquo;<a href="http://www.gdcvault.com/play/1020449/Storytelling-in-Multiplayer-Competitive" target="_blank">Competitive Multiplayer Storytelling</a>&rdquo; talks.</p>
<p>So, until next year&rsquo;s GDC, enjoy these links on links on links.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>

      </div>
</article>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-preface-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-preface-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-preface" class="zone zone-preface clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-4 region region-preface-first" id="region-preface-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-preface-first-inner">
    <div class="block block-panels-mini block-career-header block-panels-mini-career-header odd block-without-title" id="block-panels-mini-career-header">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" id="mini-panel-career_header">
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-node careers-landing-header" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="ds-1col exp-layout-text-related node node-explore-banner view-mode-full clearfix ">
    <div class="field-group-format group_scroll_group field-group-div group-scroll-group scroll-pane-explore speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field-group-format group_explore_meta field-group-div group-explore-meta  speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Rioters Wanted</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&rsquo;re looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. These individuals will become part of entrepreneurial teams who prefer action (kicking ass) over process and bureaucracy (taking names). We embrace those who see things differently, who <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">aren&#39;t afraid to experiment</a>, and who have a healthy disregard for the rules.</p>
<p>Applicants should first learn about Riot and play <em>League of Legends </em>because we&#39;re looking for people who, like us, take play seriously and for whom it&#39;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own, because hands-on gaming experience is our ultimate guiding compass.</p>
<p>We&#39;re hiring for multiple levels, from associate to lead, so don&#39;t get hung up on the title; it&#39;s all about the team. For the roles below that are listed by team name, we&#39;re hiring for varying levels of XP.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-explore-related-articles field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">

</div><div class="field-item odd">
